body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
 spack install julia@1.7.1
 ```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.17.1-973-991438a242
* **Python:** 3.8.10
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### Additional information

@haampie  @vchuravy,  julia@1.7.0 builds fine, but since #27280 there is a build issue in llvm I guess
```
==> llvm: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> llvm: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'ninja' '-j16' '-v'
#[...]
```

See [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7946130/spack-build-out.txt).


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: llvm +libcxx requires python distutils
